summary: On August 26th at 12pm ET / 9am PT, Frank Chaparro will be joined by industry executives exploring the state of institutional spot liquidity within digital assets.
title: The Block Presents: The State of Institutional Spot Liquidity - Brought to you by Altonomy
content: On August 26th at 12pm ET / 9am PT, Frank Chaparro will be joined by industry executives exploring the state of institutional spot liquidity within digital assets.
You can learn about the panelists and register for the webinar below:

<iframe loading="lazy" title="The Block Presents: Institutional Spot Liquidity -- Brought to you by Altonomy | The Block" src="https://app.livestorm.co/p/5e065f7c-fcb8-4c70-a294-6a5d6388ec14/form" width="100%" height="360" frameborder="0" data-v-f87c67ca=""></iframe>

Ricky Li, Co-founder of Altonomy. Now based in New York, he is a veteran trader in the cryptocurrency market and traditional commodities markets. Li holds a CFA Charter and Ph.D. in Computer Science from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute.
Meltem Demirors, Chief Strategy Officer, CoinShare

Meltem Demirors is Chief Strategy Officer of CoinShare, an investment firm that manages hundreds of millions in assets on behalf of a global investor base, and is a trusted partner to investors and entrepreneurs navigating the digital asset ecosystem. Meltem oversees the firm’s managed strategies group and its New York office, and leads corporate development as a board director. Previously, she was part of the founding team of Digital Currency Group. She teaches at MIT and Oxford, and serves on the WEF Blockchain Council.
Daniel Matuszewski is a tenured industry expert, starting his career at Kraken, followed by Circle Trade. Dan is currently co-founder and partner at CMS holdings.
